transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello, this is Sarah from ABC Collections calling for Mrs. Davis.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: This is Mrs. Davis, but I already told you people I can't pay right now!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand your frustration. You must pay this debt or we'll have no choice but to take further action!

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Are you threatening me? I want to speak to your supervisor!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: If you don't pay today, we'll garnish your wages. This is your final warning!
